original_text: Show people that you are strong. Cause sick people to become well. Do other powerful things to show that you are God. It is the authority of your holy servant Jesus that will make these things happen.’
korean_text: 손을 내밀어 병을 낫게 하시옵고 표적과 기사가 거룩한 종 예수의 이름으로 이루어지게 하옵소서 하더라

sentences.original_text: Show people that you are strong
Cause sick people to become well
to show that you are God
It is the authority of your holy servant Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 당신의 거룩한 종 예수님의 권세니

sentences.original_text: that will make these things happen
sentences.korean_translation: 그 권세가 이 일들을 이루게 할 것입니다
